question: To what extent do your proposed activities/investments require households to make upfront financial investments?
To what extent do your proposed activities/investments focussed on agricultural production?
To what extent do your proposed activities/investments require households to change their current practices or make use of new information sources?
To what extent do your proposed activities/investments require a healthy workforce?
To what extent do your proposed activities/investments require households to make use of alternative agricutural inputs?
To what extent do your proposed activities/investments require well functioning agricultural markets?
To what extent do your proposed activities/investments require households to make use of storage and processing facilities?
To what extent do your proposed activities/investments require households to have access to irrigation services?
